message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $10,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
